description: A collection of SvelteKit design pattern examples.

scripts.build: read -p 'Which .env mode? (ex: production uses .env.production): ' mode; if [ -z $mode ]; then echo Aborted && exit 1; elif [ ! -e .env.$mode ]; then echo Not found && exit 1; fi; vite build --mode $mode
